attributes.action: Introduce bank regulation measures in the UK similar to that proposed by President Obama
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: US President Barack Obama has proposed significant new curbs on the activities of banks to try to prevent future financial crises. In order for his reforms to be effective similar measures need to be introduced throughout the world. The UK government should introduce similar reforms without delay and before the coming general election.
